name: tapwood_server
description: ## features tcp server and client for communication between arduino and openframeworks. - fast and reliable communication between arduino and openframeworks - debugging interface 	- prints raw messages 	- handles special messages (connection, status...) 	- click to send test string - robust. can handle: 	- late server launch / server crash & relaunch 	- arduino disconnect & reconnect
author: Bastien Girschig <bastien.girschig@gmail.com> (http://www.bastiengirschig.fr)
